name: ETHDenver
description: ETHDenver is the world's largest Web3 hackathon and community innovation festival, returning February 24â€“March 6, 2026 to Denver, Colorado. Organized by the ETHDenver community (SporkDAO), it features a massive hackathon, builder tracks, keynotes, workshops, panels, art installations, music events, and networking focused on Ethereum, blockchain development, DeFi, NFTs, DAOs, privacy, scaling solutions, and decentralized innovation in a fully community-owned and decentralized format.
